sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"期望，指望"之意。
means: expectation ： 指期待某事发生或假设某事能发生，多含揣想的意味。
hope ： 通常指建立在愿望基础上的期待。这种期待有可能发生或实现，但也可能相反。
outlook ： 多指根据征兆或分析对要发生的事情的愿望或预料。
prospect与outlook的含义相近，但侧重对成功、利润和舒适生活等方面的期待。

word_mean: 预期：可以预料或期待的

PerfectNetExp.abs: 物业常用英语（2）_中华会计网校 ... discounted cash flow models 折现值现金流量模型 expectation 期望值 letting 出租.
developing actuality and expectation of facing fireproof paint., 我国饰面型防火涂料的发展现状及其展望.
“期待”的英文怎么说？_百度知道 ... 3. hope for： 希望, 期待 6. expectation： 期待,期望,前程 10. hope 希望，期待，盼望.
expansion ratio 膨胀率expectation 期待值expected value 期待值

list.abs: 虞字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 准备,防范〖 prepare〗 企望;期待〖 hope;expect〗 贻误;欺诈〖 bungle;cheat〗.
英语doing与to do的区别_爱问知识人 ... mean 意欲，打算 expect 期望 omit 忽略，漏.
The embarrassment of buying the aircraft were expected to improve in the next few years ., 买飞机人的尴尬在未来几年有望改善.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin expectatio(n-), from the verb expectare (see expect)

entry.def: Your expectations are your strong hopes or beliefs that something will happen or that you will get something that you want.

example.ex: Students' expectations were as varied as their expertise...
example.tran: 学生们的期望根据他们的专业各有不同。

example.ex: The car has been General Motors' most visible success story, with sales far exceeding expectations...
example.tran: 那种车是通用汽车公司有目共睹最成功的车型，销量远远超过预期。

entry.def: A person's expectations are strong beliefs which they have about the proper way someone should behave or something should happen.

example.ex: Stephen Chase had determined to live up to the expectations of the Company.
example.tran: 斯蒂芬·蔡斯决心不辜负公司的期望。

example.ex: ...the expectation that the grieving process should have a time limit on it.
example.tran: 希望悲痛情绪不要长久持续下去

means.word_mean: 1. belief about (or mental picture of) the future
3. the feeling that something is about to happen
4. the sum of the values of a random variable divided by the number of values

auth_sentence.content: But it's my dismal expectation that it will.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it's my dismal expectation that it will.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it's my dismal expectation that it will.

auth_sentence.content: The atmosphere was charged, the expectation almost tangible.
auth_sentence.res_content: The atmosphere was charged, the expectation almost tangible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The atmosphere was charged, the expectation almost tangible.

auth_sentence.content: Because everything is out of my expectation at all!
auth_sentence.res_content: Because everything is out of my expectation at all!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Because everything is out of my expectation at all!

stems_affixes.value_cn: 想不到的, 意外的, 未预料到
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+expect[v.预期;期望,指望]+ed表形容词→adj.想不到的, 意外的, 未预料到
expect[v.预期;期望,指望]+ation表名词→n.预期,期望,指望
speculate投机;思索,推测+ion表名词→n.思索,推测,投机

Sentence.sentence: We judge a potential partner according to our specific cultural expectations about what romantic love should feel like.
It ensures that students' expectations are successfully fulfilled.
They fall short of expectations in teaching and research
Governments in developed nations devise and implement policy that changes consumer expectations.
Behind the differences in sex, skin tones and mother tongues, there are common attitudes, expectations and ambitions which risk creating a set of clones among the business leaders of the future.

sentences.en: He has little expectation of passing the exam.
sentences.cn: 他对考试及格不抱希望。

sentences.en: His parents have great expectations for his future.
sentences.cn: 他父母对他的前途深寄厚望。

jushi.english: The plan has succeeded beyond our expectations.
jushi.chinese: 这项计划竟出乎我们意料地获得了成功。

jushi.english: The teachers haven't great expectations for her future.
jushi.chinese: 老师们对她的前途不寄厚望。

jushi.english: He has little expectation of passing the exam.
jushi.chinese: 他对考试及格不抱希望。
